user.title: ICS
user.description: Enter the sensor name and configure sensor parameters. More info on https://github.com/koljawindeler/ics#configuration-options

data.name: Friendly name (can be changed later on) and title for the config flow (fix)
data.url: The url to the ics file. Usually http://domain/calendar.ics but can also be local file:///tmp/test.ics
data.id: Unique number to identify your sensor later on. e.g. id=1 results in sensor.ical_1
data.startswith: Filter, see link above for more info

error.invalid_url: The URL is not valid, could not download data.
error.invalid_ics: The downloaded file can not be parsed, not a valid ICS file.
error.invalid_timeformat: The timeformat is not valid (see http://strftime.org/)
